alert.note: Alert for Schuyler; Steuben; Yates (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Binghamton (South Central New York and Northeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 15 at 9:16PM EDT by NWS Binghamton
info.description: ...Cluster of strong thunderstorms will affect portions of west central Schuyler, Yates and northern Steuben Counties through 1015 PM EDT... At 914 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Cohocton, or 10 miles east of Dansville, moving southeast at 30 mph. A stronger storm was located just northwest of Dansville. These storms will move southeast over the next hour. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Hornell, Bath, Penn Yan, Benton, Urbana, Canisteo, Potter, Wayland, Tyrone and Middlesex. This includes the following highway exits... Interstate 86/Route 17 between 34 North and 40. Interstate 390 between 1 and 3. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: These storms may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service.
